title: Federated Deep Q-Learning and 5G load balancing
abstract: arXiv:2403.08813v1 Announce Type: cross  Abstract: Despite advances in cellular network technology, base station (BS) load balancing remains a persistent problem. Although centralized resource allocation methods can address the load balancing problem, it still remains an NP-hard problem. In this research, we study how federated deep Q learning can be used to inform each user equipment (UE) of the each BS's load conditions. Federated deep Q learning's load balancing enables intelligent UEs to independently select the best BS while also limiting the amount of private information exposed to the network. translated_title: 联合深度Q学习与5G负载平衡
translated_abstract: 尽管蜂窝网络技术取得了进展，基站（BS）负载平衡仍然是一个持久性问题。虽然集中资源分配方法可以解决负载平衡问题，但仍然是一个NP难问题。本研究研究了如何利用联合深度Q学习来通知每个用户设备（UE）各个BS的负载情况。联合深度Q学习的负载平衡使得智能UE可以独立选择最佳BS，同时限制了向网络暴露的私人信息量。
tldr: 本研究提出并分析了一个联合深度Q学习负载平衡系统，利用Open-RAN xAPP框架和近实时射频接口控制器（near-RT RIC）实施。我们的模拟结果表明，与目前UE使用的最大信噪比（MAX-SINR）方法相比，我们提出的深度Q学习模型可以持续提供更好的负载平衡性能。
en_tdlr: This study introduces and analyzes a federated deep Q learning load balancing system implemented using the Open-RAN xAPP framework and the near-Real Time Radio Interface Controller (near-RT RIC). Results show that compared to the MAX-SINR method, the proposed deep Q learning model consistently provides better load balancing performance.
